page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE 1
page.content: Mrs Moore lives with her sons Tim,Simon and Oliver in Barnham.On Sundays she gets up about 10am.She then feeds Oliver and gets him dressed.She sees Kevin to work.Then Digby is taken for a walk.Sometimes Mrs Moore goes to Church.On most Sundays Mrs Moore and her family go out for Lunch. On Wednesdays she rises at about 7.30am and gets Oliver his breakfast.By the time he settles down it is 8.30am.Tim and Simon then go off to school.Oliver goes to playschool at 9.30.Mrs Moore then goes home and rests for one hour.She then does the washing and makes the beds.Next she goes shopping. By Joanna Cudlipp and Amanda Ashman.
